name: Missing Pieces (Studio Bright)
description:
The ocean has overtaken a once great city. Gather the remnants to survive.

The submarine is equipped with a grappling hook that can reel in scrap resources. Search for resources buried in the seabed, and use them to upgrade your vessel.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Up/Down Arrows - Dive and Rise

Spacebar - Drop and Reel Grappling Hook

Tab - Toggle Maintenance Screen

Team: 

DannyJay#9255 (Studio Bright)

ForTimeBeing#5488

Assets:

ProcMod (Procedural World)

Boundary and Prefab Tool (Level Design)

Dev Notes:

As usual we spent too much time on the world and atmosphere so supporting mechanics like combat (harpoons) and damage didn't make it into the jam. Unfortunately, that makes it lackluster as a game.
